title: Thailand Prime Minister gets royal approval to dissolve Parliament, hold elections early next year

description: Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna's spy thriller 'Dhurandhar' is a box office sensation, exceeding expectations and rewriting records. The film has shown remarkable consistency, crossing Rs 300 crore worldwide. Strong word-of-mouth and audience approval are driving its phenomenal success, particularly its action and narrative.

Both leaders emphasized continued collaboration for global peace and prosperity.

description: India suffered a 51-run defeat to South Africa in the second T20I, raising concerns over Shubman Gill and Suryakumar Yadav's form. The team's bowling discipline also faltered, with numerous full tosses and expensive overs contributing to South Africa's 213/4. India's chase collapsed early, falling short at 162 despite Tilak Varma's 62.

description: A pregnant domestic worker, Sunali Khatun, recounts her harrowing experience of being deported to Bangladesh despite possessing Indian identity documents. Detained during an identity verification drive, she and her family were allegedly pushed across the border, leading to months of hardship and fear. Her father's legal intervention highlights the family's desperate plea for justice.

title: Will establish peace, not buy it; to reopen old terror cases: J&K L-G Sinha

This unprecedented payout follows thousands of flight cancellations, stranding passengers for hours. While the airline views these three days as the peak disruption period, affected passengers from December 6-7 are excluded from this specific voucher offer.

New deadlines for submitting enumeration forms and publishing draft electoral rolls have been set, with final rolls expected in February 2026. This revision aims to ensure all eligible voters are included.

Now, Mexico to slap tariffs; may hit Indian car companies
description: Mexico's Senate approved a bill imposing 5-50% tariffs on over 1,400 Asian products, including India's, starting next year. This move, targeting China's massive output, could significantly impact India's automotive and auto parts exports, valued at $1.1 billion.  The tariffs aim to boost Mexican revenue and potentially ease US trade pressure.

title: ED searches 40 sites in 4 states for 'highly radicalised IS module'
description: The Enforcement Directorate conducted extensive searches across 40 locations in Delhi, Kolkata, Maharashtra, and Uttar Pradesh targeting a radicalized IS module. Investigations revealed alleged use of crime proceeds for weapons, explosives, recruitment, and training of terror suspects. This money laundering probe stems from an NIA chargesheet, with intelligence suggesting illicit wood trade funding extremist activities.

title: Hospitality, textiles sectors set to drive jobs growth: Study
description: Textiles, apparel, and hospitality are poised for significant job growth by 2030, fueled by increased investment, a new report reveals.  While manufacturing and services will also contribute, the focus is on boosting stable, salaried positions.  The think tank urges a strategic approach, emphasizing skill development and addressing the informal sector's dominance to enhance labor absorption and drive economic expansion.

title: We don't go by external rankings on climate, pollution: Govt
description: India prioritizes its own assessments for environmental policy over external global rankings on pollution and climate resilience. The Environment Ministry stated it doesn't recognize foreign reports like the Global Climate Risk Index or IQAir's air quality rankings as a basis for domestic policy. Instead, the nation relies on its own initiatives like 'Swachh Vayu Survekshan' for evaluating progress.

Speaker Om Birla, confirming no such permission was granted, assured action if the information is substantiated. The incident prompted calls for decorum and adherence to rules from the treasury benches.

title: HC directs online platforms to act on Salman’s plea
Can't copy-paste old voter lists for SIR: Supreme Court
description: The Supreme Court emphasised that electoral roll revisions must be thorough, not mere copies. The Election Commission's voter enumeration process will involve inquiries to confirm citizenship, rather than waiting for complaints.  The Court noted migration as a valid reason for nationwide roll updates, even without specific statistics, and dismissed claims of arbitrariness in the selection of states for the exercise.

title: Ayesha Curry says women 'waiting for their moment' around Stephen

description: Maven abruptly stopped communicating with ground stations over the weekend. NASA said this week that it was working fine before it went behind the red planet. When it reappeared, there was only silence.

title: CeeDee Lamb injury: Cowboys expect quick recovery as WR clears concussion steps
description: Dallas Cowboys' star CeeDee Lamb is showing positive signs of recovery from a concussion sustained against the Detroit Lions. While Lamb was a limited participant in practice, his return on Sunday remains unconfirmed.

Lawmakers are now demanding urgent action to protect these vital workers.

Shiver's recent significant salary increase and social media silence have fueled speculation amid the ongoing investigation.

title: 5 daily habits that increase visceral fat and how to reduce them
description: Stubborn belly fat may be linked to hidden visceral fat, a dangerous internal fat.  Poor lifestyle habits like inactivity, processed foods, chronic stress, excessive alcohol, and lack of sleep contribute to its accumulation.  This internal fat poses serious health risks.  Discover simple, actionable tips to combat this harmful fat and improve your well-being.

title: Money mistakes: Kevin O’Leary warns consumers; the biggest financial trap people fall into unnoticed
description: Shark Tank's Kevin O'Leary warns homebuyers against purchasing oversized properties, calling it a significant financial pitfall. He advises keeping mortgage payments under a third of after-tax income to avoid becoming 'house poor.' O'Leary advocates for a staged approach, starting with a smaller home and upgrading later as finances strengthen, especially with current high mortgage rates.

title: Venus Williams & Andrea Preti net worth 2025: Career, family & business
description: Venus Williams boasts an estimated $95 million net worth in 2025, primarily from her legendary tennis career and successful fashion and design businesses. Her partner, Andrea Preti, an actor and businessman, contributes an estimated $1-2 million. Together, their combined net worth is approximately $96-97 million, reflecting their individual financial achievements.
